Just Pretend

In this top-down 3D roguelike adventure you play as a shy kid whose drawings have been brought to life by an evil witch. You must become a hero and defeat your drawings and the witch commanding them! Up to 4 players can explore vast procedurally generated environments, avoid dangerous traps, find helpful items, discover secrets, defeat fantastic enemies, and battle ridiculous bosses.

Inspired by the classic Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past and roguelike greats such as Spelunky.



Release Date: Late 2017

Website:

Platforms: Consoles, PC/Mac
